channel.title: learning on personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in learning on personal blog

item.title: Day 0
item.description: Day 0 I’m starting a small blog to track the learning progress. My goal is to develop a habit of learning every day. I wanna spend at least 100 minutes every day on watching training videos or reading book. I wanna start this with at least 4 “pomodoro” sessions that will be 25 minutes long.
